heading: Moronai anonyora kubatsira maRamani—MaNifai ayo asingarambe Kristu anourayiwa. Zvingangove makore 401 kusvika ku421 shure kwekunge Kristu azvarwa.

verses.txt: Zvino ini Moronai, ndapedza kupfupikisa zvinyorwa zvevanhu vaJaredhi, ndakafunga kuti handifanire kunge ndichanyora zvimwe; asi handisati ndafa; handiite kuti maRamani andizive nokuti vangandiuraye.
Nokuti tarisai, hondo dzavo pachavo dzinotyisa zvikuru; uye nokuda kworuvengo rwavo vayiuraya chero muNifai asingarambe Kristu.
Uye ini Moronai, handingarambe Kristu; nokudaro, handizivi kwandinokwanisa kuti ndichengetedze upenyu hwangu.

Nokudaro, ndinonyora zvimwe zvinhu zvishoma, zvisingawirirane neizvo zvandanga ndichifunga; nokuti ndanga ndafunga kuti ndisanyore; asi ndinonyora zvimwe zvinhu zvishoma, kuti zvimwe zvingave zvinobatsira kuhama dzangu, maRamani, nerimwe zuva riri mberi, maererano nokuda kwaIshe.
